news_items.en_desc: Due to Serv00 restrictions, Claude-PL is unavailable.
Accessing Claude-US currently shows 'This site can’t be reached.' The upstream developer of Fuclaude is working on a fix.
news_items.zh_desc: 目前访问Claude-US会提示“无法通过此地址访问网站”，Fuclaude上游开发者正在修复。

news_items.en_desc: The Fuclaude main program has been updated and can be accessed normally. Previous users will not be banned. Currently using CloudFlare Warp to access.
news_items.zh_desc: 更新Fuclaude主程序，可以正常访问，之前使用过的不会被封号。目前采用CloudFlare Warp中转访问。

news_items.en_desc: To improve the access speed of Azure server, the Azure server will be migrated from the United States to Japan.
news_items.zh_desc: 为了提高Azure服务器访问速度，将Azure服务器从美国迁移到日本。

news_items.en_desc: Azure server has been successfully migrated, all services are back online.
news_items.zh_desc: Azure服务器迁移完毕，所有服务恢复正常。

news_items.en_title: All Serv00 related projects have been terminated
news_items.zh_title: Serv00相关项目全部终止服务
news_items.en_desc: Due to the instability and restrictions of the Serv00 service, all related projects have been terminated.
news_items.zh_desc: 由于Serv00服务不稳定和封控问题，所有相关项目全部终止服务。
